ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.useraware

Interface UserAwareHost

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RdaHostUserAware

    public interface UserAwareHost
    This interface is intended for hosts that support the user aware mechanisms. The methods allow the transfer of a map with user priorities.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei
    See Also:
    UserAwareDatacenter, RdaUserAwareVmScheduler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Float> getUserPriorities(double currentTime)
      To retrieve the priorities of all users/customers that have a running VM on this host.
      double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime, Map<String,Float> priorities)
      This is the corresponding method for public double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime) Hosts, supporting this interface, should throw an UnsupportedOperationException when calling this default method.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserPriorities

        Map<String,Float> getUserPriorities(double currentTime)
        To retrieve the priorities of all users/customers that have a running VM on this host.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - The current simulation time.
        Returns:
        A map, that contains the priority associated with each user.

      • updateVmsProcessing

        double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime,
                         Map<String,Float> priorities)
        This is the corresponding method for public double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime) Hosts, supporting this interface, should throw an UnsupportedOperationException when calling this default method.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - The current simulation time.
        priorities - A map, that contains the priority associated with each user.
        Returns:
        the time of the next expected event for the concerning host.
